channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors should brace for more trade-war volatility as ‘high-stakes game of chicken’ between U.S. and China begins

item.title: Papa John’s stock rallies, as report adds to takeover speculation
item.description: Shares of pizza chain Papa John’s rallied on Monday, following the latest report that it could become a takeover target, as the restaurant industry st...

item.title: Tesla made a gamble with its latest price cuts. Will it pay off?
item.description: The new ‘standard’ Tesla models might not be priced low enough for consumers to justify the tradeoffs, one expert says.

item.title: My real-estate agent wants me to spend $8,000 on a new driveway. Will that really help sell my house?
item.description: Regardless of which renovations you choose to make, don’t expect them to rapidly reduce how much time your home spends on the market.

item.title: It’s too good to be true — but you may not believe it. How to listen when investment pros say ‘back off.’
item.description: Losing $150,000 in crypto, being convinced of easy money in real estate, and other dangers from unrealistic expectations.

item.title: BlackRock fund manager says investors can boost income by going global with government bonds
item.description: A U.S.-only portfolio is very correlated with the nation's business cycle, inflation and U.S. Treasury issuance, said BlackRock's Tom Becker.

item.title: An options trade to protect against persistent macro uncertainty
item.description: Options trader Michael Khouw explains how investors can use options to protect themselves against near-term headwinds.

item.title: The bull market just turned 3 years old – how long do they typically last after making that milestone?
item.description: The S&P 500 has climbed a wall of worry back to all-time highs since bottoming on Oct. 12, 2022. That's a good sign for what comes next.

item.title: Best Stocks: 5 names on our list showed strength during Friday's sell-off. Where we think they will go from here
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo go through five names on the Best Stocks list that showed resilience while the broader market struggled on Friday.

item.title: The charts on this popular bond ETF are improving as volatility increases, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton goes through the technical backdrop of TLT.
